problem_text_cn: 如图,将一块含有30°的直角三角板的顶点放在直尺的一边上,若∠1=48°,那么∠2的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, put the vertex of a right triangle plate containing N_0 on one side of the ruler, if ∠1 = N_1, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图:∵将一块含有30°的直角三角板的顶点放在直尺的一-边上,∠1=48°∴∠2=∠3=180°-48°-30°=102°故选:D.
